definition: warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger

sentences.english: Even if does burning pond red simply streaming to rotate also hide not to live her pallor.
sentences.chinese: 縱使炎池紅光流轉，也遮不住她的蒼白。

sentences.english: Too big a risk, even with Mr. Eastwood at the wheel.
sentences.chinese: 縱使有伊斯特伍德保駕護航，冒的險也忒大了吧。

sentences.english: If heaven is a million years away, oh just call me and I make your day.
sentences.chinese: 縱使路途遙遠千年萬年，我也必定將你帶入那片天堂。

sentences.english: Even if indifference, but he was always a limitless a faith gives teared up.
sentences.chinese: 縱使淡漠無邊，卻總有一種信仰讓淚流滿面。

sentences.english: We're united tightly with sincere blessing and yearning!
sentences.chinese: 縱使遙隔兩地，真誠的祝福與懷念會將彼此緊緊相牽。

sentences.english: Can stand back and take the road, the blood become river and even so.
sentences.chinese: 可回頭觀望來時的路，血流成河，縱使如此。

sentences.english: A liar is not considered when he speaks the truth.
sentences.chinese: 扯謊者縱使講實話也沒人相信。

sentences.english: Talk to me sometimes, even if I don't understand your words.
sentences.chinese: 請偶爾對我說說話，縱使我聽不懂你說的內容。

sentences.english: He still smoke despite the continual warning of the doctor.
sentences.chinese: 縱使醫生多次正告，他還老抽菸。

sentences.english: Though your enemy seem a mouse, yet watch him like a lion.
sentences.chinese: 縱使敵人小如鼠，亦須當作雄獅看。

sentences.english: Even though your sins like blood, I can make it as white as snow.
sentences.chinese: 縱使你的罪孽殷紅似血，我也能使之潔白如雪。

sentences.english: That even the weariest river Winds somewhere safe to sea.
sentences.chinese: 縱使細流常逶迤，也會平安歸海洋。

sentences.english: It's a deception, as far as I can discover.
sentences.chinese: 一個人的騙術縱使能瞞天過海，卻瞞不了自己的良心。

sentences.english: Step forward amid your fears. Don't wait for them to subside.
sentences.chinese: 不必等到不安消失，縱使害怕也要踏出去。

sentences.english: I will always be there, even if the endless sea is filled with the loneliness.
sentences.chinese: 可以是“我會一直在，縱使寂寞開成海。”

sentences.english: Let justice be done, though the heavens should fall.
sentences.chinese: 縱使天塌下來，該算的賬也要算。

definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
to come and go/to have friendly relations with/in the past/previous
